TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi beforefieldinit GestureRecognitionResult extends System.Object

remarks.format:
## Remarks A <xref:System.Windows.Ink.GestureRecognitionResult> 포함를 <xref:System.Windows.Ink.ApplicationGesture> 했을 가능성 수준과는 <xref:System.Windows.Ink.GestureRecognizer> 제스처를 올바르게 식별 합니다.
사용 합니다 <xref:System.Windows.Ink.GestureRecognitionResult.RecognitionConfidence%2A> 했을 가능성 수준을 결정 하는 속성은는 <xref:System.Windows.Ink.GestureRecognizer> 제스처를 올바르게 식별 합니다.
## Examples 다음 예제에서 제스처를 식별 하는 방법에 설명 된 <xref:System.Windows.Controls.InkCanvas>합니다. 이 예제에서는 있다고 가정를 <xref:System.Windows.Controls.InkCanvas> 호출 `inkCanvas1` 하 고 해당 <xref:System.Windows.Controls.InkCanvas.Gesture> 이벤트 코드의 이벤트 처리기에 연결 되어 있습니다.
[!code-csharp[GestureSample#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Wpf/GestureSample/CSharp/Window1.xaml.cs#1)] [!code-vb[GestureSample#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Wpf/GestureSample/VisualBasic/Window1.xaml.vb#1)]

MemberSignature.Value: Public ReadOnly Property ApplicationGesture As ApplicationGesture
public: property System::Windows::Ink::ApplicationGesture ApplicationGesture { System::Windows::Ink::ApplicationGesture get(); };

Attribute.AttributeName: get: System.Runtime.TargetedPatchingOptOut("Performance critical to inline this type of method across NGen image boundaries")

remarks.format:

MemberSignature.Value: Public ReadOnly Property RecognitionConfidence As RecognitionConfidence

Attribute.AttributeName: get: System.Runtime.TargetedPatchingOptOut("Performance critical to inline this type of method across NGen image boundaries")

Docs.summary: 가 제스처를 인식했는지에 대한 신뢰 수준을 가져옵니다.

remarks.format:
